duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and help lead large, multi-year transformation programs within the IT organization.
Facilitate discussions with project sponsors and key stakeholders to finalize project scope, detailed requirements, solution design, and solution implementation planning.
Track, monitor, and mitigate all issues and risks, and communicate status to management including any obstacles and potential executive asks.
Ensure initiatives are adhering to defined project management standards and recommend changes to governance structures as needed.
Create go-live strategy, assess impact to end-users, and ensure ultimate realization of intended business benefits.
Gain exposure to larger suite of modernization and employee engagement initiatives/process improvements within the Transformation team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required. Advanced degrees are an asset.
